Posts.Content: Hi there, I am sorry to hear about what is happening with you, I'm in the same situation, biopsy on Monday!  Joy! Four years ago I had DCIS, four lumpectomies and five weeks radiotherapy , didn't expect this now at routine mammogram, I think I may be faced with mastectomy too, hope your doing ok  Pam x
Posts.Title: Any advice is most welcome

Posts.Content: Thank you Karen, how are you doing?  Pam xx
Posts.Title: Any advice is most welcome

Posts.Content: Had my results yesterday , and all was fine, necrosis from the lipofilling had caused fibrous tissue that looks like calcifications on mamogram, I am so relieved and want to wish everything good health and hugs, I will keep around here anyway , love to all xx
Posts.Title: Any advice is most welcome

Posts.Content: That's lovely , hope you are having a great time!  Hope all is fine with your mamogram , stay well  Lots of love  Pam xx
Posts.Title: Any advice is most welcome

Posts.Content: Thank you , I will Speak soon Sam xx
Posts.Title: Year today since diagnosis

Posts.Content: Sam, I am so happy reading your post, this will help  so many people . i'm having a biopsy on Monday and based on results think  my only option will be a double mastectomy, will come back to  you with this if that's ok , will see what my options are  glad you are doing well  Pam xx
Posts.Title: Year today since diagnosis

Posts.Content: Hope all goes well tomorrow  Pam xx
Posts.Title: Year today since diagnosis

Posts.Content: Kergan , the waiting is the worst bit , I might be facing the same  as you soon , I'll be thinking about you tomorrow, keep strong  Pam xx
Posts.Title: Year today since diagnosis

Posts.Content: Hi Lynn, and all the other ladies,  Sorry to hear what you are going through, I'm not at your stage, I'm waiting on results for a second time. It's so scary and upsetting and takes over your life, I hope your ok , I can't offer any help with chemo , I haven't had that , I had radiotherapy last time, I just wanted to say I'm thinking about you all , Much love Pam
